## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of what you want to be added.

## Problem It Solves

Describe the problem this feature would solve.

## Proposed Solution

A clear and concise description of how you would like the feature to work.

## Alternatives Considered

A clear and concise description of any alternative or related feature you have considered.

## Additional Context

Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
